amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the $3 million in funding for the MGPTS Type III or Rapid Deployable Shelter project and reduce the overall cost of the bill by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 111-233 to prohibit the $3 million in funding for the MGPTS Type III or Rapid Deployable Shelter project and reduce the overall cost of the bill by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 353 (Roll no. 672).
